BBEX3.A.CYP.EUR.BB.AC.A04: Euro foreign exchange reference rate of the ECB / EUR 1 = CYP ... / Cyprus / up to 2007

General: The ECB published daily euro foreign exchange reference rates for Cyprus pounds (CYP), which were calculated on the basis of the concertation between central banks at 14.15. Cyprus joined the euro area on 1 January 2008; irrevocable euro conversion rate: EUR 1 = CYP 0.585274.
Methodology: Averages: Bundesbank calculations based on the daily euro reference exchange rates published by the ECB.
